snippet: WEINSTEIN--Dr. Betty C. Buchsbaum, beloved aunt to many nieces and nephews, devoted mother to son Daniel and grandmother of Koan. Dr. Buchsbaum sadly died on February 22, 2016 in Pittsburgh, PA. A gifted psychotherapist, she practiced in Westchester County for over 35 years. Mourned by bereaved spouse William, siblings Gertrude Ostrove, David Buchsbaum and wife Betty. She exuded grace, love, and vitality; a woman of valor. Barbara Miller and James Alleman 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINSTEIN--Dr. Betty C. Buchsbaum, beloved aunt to many nieces and nephews, devoted mother to son Daniel and grandmother of Koan. Dr. Buchsbaum sadly died on February 22, 2016 in Pittsburgh, PA. A gifted psychotherapist, she practiced in Westchester County for over 35 years. Mourned by bereaved spouse William, siblings Gertrude Ostrove, David Buchsbaum and wife Betty. She exuded grace, love, and vitality; a woman of valor. Barbara Miller and James Alleman 1/3
